titles: A sermon preached before the Queen at White-Hall, January the 30th being the day of the martyrdom of King Charles the First by the Bishop of St. Asaph, Lord Almoner to Their Majesties.
author: Lloyd, William, 1627-1717.
notes: Half title: The Bishop of St. Asaph's sermon preach'd before the Queen at White-Hall.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
